thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Trump’s Iran Decision Adds to Emerging Market Currency Volatility

author: Olga Cotaga
title: Trump’s Iran Decision Adds to Emerging Market Currency Volatility
text:
Emerging market currencies were volatile on Wednesday, after President Donald Trump’s decision to pull out of the Iran nuclear deal added to the woes of markets already pressured by the rising dollar.
The Russian ruble, Indonesian rupiah and the South African rand were among the currencies to fall, while the Turkish lira whipsawed as investors dialed back on risk.
